remarks: Orthocomplement of the unit subspace (all vectors).  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
doch1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
doch1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch1.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
doch1.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
doch1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( ._|_ ` V ) = { .0. } ) $.
